snippet: The Nets have played in seven different arenas. But when Deron Williams re-signed, it was as if the franchise had washed away its troubled past while crossing the Hudson.
abstract: Brooklyn Nets have played in seven different arenas, but hope to settle in to their new Barclays Center arena for the long haul; they are the first major professional sports team to call Brooklyn home since the Dodgers; star point guard Deron Williams re-signs, giving the franchise a hopeful outlook.
lead_paragraph: The Nets have played in seven different arenas. But when Deron Williams re-signed, it was as if the franchise had washed away its troubled past while crossing the Hudson.

headline.seo: Nets Move to Brooklyn With Legitimacy in Sight
headline.main: Nets, After a String of Homes, Hope to Settle Into Brooklyn
headline.print_headline: Nets, After a String of Homes, Hope to Settle Into Brooklyn
